sources.title: Arizona Badman
sources.description: Another B-western from the bottom of the horse trough. This one has a ten-year-old gunslinger and more square dancing than you're probably expecting. The good guy, Steve Donovan, has a white horse and a white hat. The bad guys don't. Directed by S Roy Luby. US release 1935. UK release 1937. 8 minutes are missing. a.k.a. "Arizona Bad Man"
